extendedInfo.description: FINALLY: Discover the secrets of how to meet women and how to attract women - quickly and easily with Carlos Xuma's Dating Advice For Men. This simple but powerful app gives you access to exclusive VIP dating tips and attraction tactics for men from Carlos Xuma (www.AttractWomen.com), one of the most respected and effective dating gurus for over 10 years. Gain magnetic attraction with hot, quality women... And get inside secrets to hidden "attraction triggers" in a woman's mind... so you have the unfair advantage in meeting and dating women. Do you see attractive women you want to meet and talk to, but you lose your nerve and never approach her? Are you tired of going out to bars and clubs to meet women and end up drinking alone? Do you get nervous and shy with women, and chicken out when you try to meet women? Would you like to get a girlfriend - but you don't know what steps to take to make it happen?Are you tired of being the Nice Guy - while some other Bad Boy walks away with the women you want? FINALLY - Discover the secrets of how to attract women in this exclusive app for your iphone or ipad. Carlos reveals how to attract women and create the kind of desire that will get you success with women that you only dreamed about before. Imagine how your friends will envy you when you discover: - How to meet women and talk to women - with unique tips, articles, videos and strategies... - Flirt with women effortlessly - Hidden ways to create instant attraction with women - that lasts... - How to text a girl - and WHAT to text a girl... - How to get a girl's number, get a date, and get intimate - without using creepy pickup lines - or fear of rejection... - Bulletproof confidence secrets of the men who get women effortlessly - and how you can steal their methods... - Online dating tips and secrets that only "insiders" know about... - And MUCH much more...! Carlos Xuma's strategies and techniques for building bulletproof confidence with women, as well as getting guys the women they want, have made thousands of guys into overnight successes in dating and "seduction." Since 2002, he's been on network television, not to mention Playboy and Maxim radio, and many other magazines and radio appearances. Carlos teaches you the Art of Alpha Attraction with women that most men will never discover. Live The Alpha Lifestyle: Unleash your masculine confidence to meet any woman, create lasting attraction, and get everything you deserve as a man...
